name: Golden Sparkles
description:
A lovely bright, golden and sparkly beverage ready to tantalize your taste buds!!
First I pour in the lovely sprite-like lemonade, add a big splash of pineapple, and then scoop out a nice amount of passion fruit. I taste, while pleasant at this point it needs to pop. I add a little Super sweet and experiment with Caps Fizz pop. Give it one hell of a shake and boom, Golden Sparkles!!

Enjoy!!

I prefer vaping this on a recurve RDA at 50W 0.12ohm SST coil.

Steep time 3 days. Good off a good shake though!
Seriously if you like a solid recipe that works give it a go!

Cheers for reading this far, now go and get mixing!

"Together, Let's Discover!!!"

author: DIYDownunderPippa

reviews.text: This is very tastey pip! That passionfruit really plays a part next to the pineapple and its for sure a fizzy drink its yummy thanks for this one
